SKT_FIRST.name: Swift Chain
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Hestia's Cheer
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Increases Attack by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.\n\n(Triggered Effect) After using <color=#28d9ed>Swift Chain</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Argo Vesta</color>, grants <color=#28d9ed>Grace of the Virgin Goddess</color>.
description: (Passive Effect) Increases Attack by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000095_2_1]</color>.\n\n(Triggered Effect) After using <color=#28d9ed>Swift Chain</color> or <color=#28d9ed>Argo Vesta</color>, grants <color=#28d9ed>Grace of the Virgin Goddess</color>.

5: Adds Unable to Counterattack / Revenge / Agile Response

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Argo Vesta
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance each to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000095_3_1]</color> chance toÂ grant increased <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_3_1] turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000095_3_1]</color> chance each to inflict irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> 2 times on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> once on the enemy for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Ignores the target's Resilience)
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts irremovable <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color>Â once on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000095_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.
